esp:image.description: KASZ-a-v1, an archaic sign for beer

body.p: This project is based on the CDLI corpus of Proto-Cuneiform texts from the Uruk IV and III periods. It also hosts a signlist which is based on several sources: the CDLI proto-cuneiform signs GitHub repository; Anshuman Pandey's Revised proposal to encode Proto-Cuneiform in Unicode; and revisions and additions by Steve Tinney.
You can view the PCSL corpus here.
You can browse the signlist here
